ozmod

クラス Sound

  • java.lang.Object
    • ozmod.Sound

  • public class Sound
extends java.lang.Object
    A sound is merely a sample encoded in a certain manner.

    • ネストされたクラスのサマリー

      ネストされたクラス 
      修飾子とタイプ クラスと説明
      static class  Sound.PULSE_TYPE
      Determines the type of pulse of a sound value.

    • メソッドのサマリー

      すべてのメソッド インスタンス・メソッド concreteメソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      Sound duplicate()
      Duplicate the sound.
      javax.sound.sampled.Clip getClip()
      Gets the native Java Clip instance to manipulate the sound at your will.
      java.lang.String getFormatDescription()
      Gets the format description of the sound under the form of a string.
      int getFrequency()
      Gets the frequency of the sound.
      int getNbBitsPerSample()
      Gets the number of bits of each sample of the sound.
      int getNbChannels()
      Gets the number of channel(s) of the sound.
      void play(boolean _loop)
      Plays the sound in loop or not.
      void setLoop(int _start, int _end)
      Sets loop points if you choose to replay the song in loop.

      • クラスから継承されたメソッド java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • メソッドの詳細

      • getNbChannels

        public int getNbChannels()
        Gets the number of channel(s) of the sound.
        戻り値:
        1 for mono, 2 for stereo

      • getNbBitsPerSample

        public int getNbBitsPerSample()
        Gets the number of bits of each sample of the sound.
        戻り値:
        Typically 8 or 16.

      • getFrequency

        public int getFrequency()
        Gets the frequency of the sound.
        戻り値:
        The frequency.

      • getFormatDescription

        public java.lang.String getFormatDescription()
        Gets the format description of the sound under the form of a string.
        戻り値:
        The format description into a string.

      • play

        public void play(boolean _loop)
        Plays the sound in loop or not.
        パラメータ:
        _loop - true to play the sound in loop, false otherwhise.

      • setLoop

        public void setLoop(int _start,
                    int _end)
        Sets loop points if you choose to replay the song in loop.
        パラメータ:
        _start - Start loop in number of frames of samples.
        _end - End loop in number of frames of samples.

      • duplicate

        public Sound duplicate()
        Duplicate the sound. Warning this also duplicate samples of the song and so is not memory friendly. However, this is the only possible native Java method.
        戻り値:
        The duplicated Sound instance.

      • getClip

        public javax.sound.sampled.Clip getClip()
        Gets the native Java Clip instance to manipulate the sound at your will. This is at your own risk.
        戻り値:
        The native Java Clip.
